setup-worktree-unix: test -f $ROOT_WORKTREE_PATH/.env && (cp $ROOT_WORKTREE_PATH/.env .env && echo '‚úÖ .env file copied from root worktree') || echo '‚ö†Ô∏è  Warning: .env file not found in root worktree'
setup-worktree-windows: if exist %ROOT_WORKTREE_PATH%\.env (copy %ROOT_WORKTREE_PATH%\.env .env && echo '‚úÖ .env file copied from root worktree') else (echo '‚ö†Ô∏è  Warning: .env file not found in root worktree')
setup-worktree: test -f $ROOT_WORKTREE_PATH/.env && (cp $ROOT_WORKTREE_PATH/.env .env && echo '‚úÖ .env file copied from root worktree') || echo '‚ö†Ô∏è  Warning: .env file not found in root worktree'
